thread.title: Hauck Twister Trio Stroller Travel System in Chocolate
thread.title_full: Hauck Twister Trio Stroller Travel System in Chocolate

title: Hauck Twister Trio Stroller Travel System in Chocolate
text: Hauck Twister Trio Stroller Travel System in Chocolate   Feed Services   The Twister can do even more. The stylish and innovative chassis draws everyone's attention and definitely sets the trend. Its high quality materials and its aerodynamics strike home. The extremely lightweight aluminum stroller Twister offers pure pleasure on every ride thanks to its 360 swivelling and lockable front wheels. On your trips, a suspension absorbs shocks gently and the locking brake ensures that the Twister has a secure stand at any time. The soft push handle is height-adjustable and can therefore be individually adjusted to your body size. Your purchases can be easily stowed in the large basket. The cuddly carrycot with soft mattress and sun visor is just perfect for your newborn. It will feel completely safe comfortable. The Zero Plus Comfort 0+ car seat offers you a lot as well. Thanks to its innovative side impact protection system with patented use of shock-absorbing PU foam and the padded 3-point harness, it guarantees optimum safety for your child on every ride.
